channel.title: Creating a SIMPLE 2D game
channel.description: Iv'e been working on RSPS for awhile now and wanted to learn "Real" Java. Iv'e created a project called Bubble Blaster, it consists of using a contraption to launch colored balls using angles to get 3 colors of a ball to "explode" and give points. Iv'e multi packaged it so everything is not held in 1 single file. Anyway's here's where it get's tricky for me, I need to create a GUI and I have no idea on how to really do it. Iv'e had imsuperman05, Atomic_Int, Rene(Different Site) to help me and none of them were able to. SO in my long trek I came here, If anyone is able to help me please don't spoonfeed me 100%, just a few things to get me started thanks.
